When you come up from Gwanghwamun Station, there is the Ilmin Art Museum! It's easy to visit in the city center, and you can know about the history of media. There is also a cute smile character in front of Dong'a Ilbo, so it's good for sightseeing.

Near Guanghuamen Square, there is an East Asian Daily Building. The newspaper is hung outside the building for people to read. Except for the Chinese registration, the rest of Korean is unrecognizable to me. There is a Ilmin Museum of Art on the first floor. It coincides with Monday. The staff said: It is not open today.

Mr. Kim Sang Wan collected mainly pottery and paintings, most of which were elegant and simple. The items hosted by the East Asian Daily were important materials for condensing the state of public opinion in a period of time. Modern art works are mainly works with a strong social atmosphere. North Korea Folk Museum is a very interesting museum! Because North Korea has always been a mysterious country, you can understand the life and livelihood of local people through this folk museum. It is worth seeing ～ It is worthwhile to visit this trip and open your eyes!

Friends who like to know more about history can't be missed here, which shows the old life habits of Korea.
